::Orchestra::

    Orchestra was ready to go, and took off.  But it was too late.
Blacknightmare was coming back, and with another bot.  Orchestra flew over
to them.

     "Hey buddy, put that weapon down!  Consider yourself a Predacon now and
forever!" Orchestra exclaimed rudely.
----- Original Message -----
From: <airly2000@...>
To: <nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com>
Sent: Tuesday, June 05, 2001 7:51 PM
Subject: Re: Arrival of a new Rpger and Character


Blacknightmare::

Computer told to Blacknightmare about the new cvomer and she told to
Orchestra "We have to go and get that bot!!!"

She ran towards the exit and went to Irenland
